content:
So we discussed this issue today on zoom, and per discussion, I tried to bump this to the top by adding a comment on it, but that doesn't seem to have any effect.. https://github.com/cds-hooks/docs/issues/3 (is that because of the deferred label? Should the deferred be removed from this and the other issue having it?)
What do folks think about the concern raised in this issue?

On this topic, as we are starting to see CDS Hooks in the field now ( :tada: ), it would be really nice to have clear documentation on how all the versions of things are specified; I think we have at least 3 things to specify:

  • Version of CDS Hooks (standard) being used (e.g. 1.0)
  • Version of my-awesome-cds-service
  • Version of the FHIR resources (in prefetch, etc)
